country.description: The country where the shop is located

country_code.description: The country code of the shop's location

weight_unit.description: The unit used for measuring weight

county_taxes.description: Flag indicating if county taxes are applicable

money_with_currency_format.description: The format used for displaying money with currency

money_in_emails_format.description: The format used for displaying money in emails

finances.description: Financial information related to the shop

pre_launch_enabled.description: Flag indicating if pre-launch settings are enabled

city.description: The city where the shop is located

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the shop's location

taxes_included.description: Flag indicating if taxes are included in prices

checkout_api_supported.description: Flag indicating if the shop supports the checkout API

setup_required.description: Flag indicating if setup is required for the shop

currency.description: The currency used in the shop
